mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.department_name AS departmentName, d.description, d.manager_id AS managerId, e.name AS managerName, -- 子查询统计：当前部门的在职员工数（关联员工表 department_id） (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees emp WHERE emp.department_id = d.id AND emp.status = 1) AS employeeCount, -- 只统计在职员工（status=1） d.created_at, d.updated_at FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.manager_id = e.id;
SELECT d.id, d.department_name AS departmentName FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e -- 给 employees 表起别名 e ON d.manager_id = e.id; -- 关联条件：部门的经理ID = 员工表的id（需明确 e.id）;
